div.a:
Horseshoe Bend Elementary School
2017 National Blue Ribbon School Profile

span.strong: Welcome to Horseshoe Bend School District

p.span:
Our Mission: Empower Through Education
Our Vision: A school that is celebrated for its academic excellence where students realize their potential and are prepared for the opportunities of a rapidly changing world.
Our Core Values: Optimism. Respect. Trust. Intention.

br.span: Effective and Ethical User of Technology

div.div: Horseshoe Bend School District #73 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to all individuals. Learn more...
